DOC.criteria: Volunteers 1860 year age . Meet Classification Criteria chronic LBP ( low back pain 6 month ) , determine refer physician . At least 4/10 clinical pain 11point LBP intensity scale . Patients must able provoke exacerbate chronic LBP use calibrate exerciselike maneuver . Must prior evaluation low back pain health care provider , may include radiographic study . Documentation evaluation seek Partners outside medical record keep subject 's research record . At least 10th grade Englishreading level ; English second language provide patient feel understand question use assessment measure . Specific cause back pain ( e.g . cancer , fracture , spinal stenosis , infection ) , Complicated back problem ( e.g . prior back surgery , medicolegal issue ) , Possible contraindication acupuncture ( e.g . coagulation disorder , cardiac pacemaker , pregnancy , seizure disorder ) , condition might confound acupuncture intervention effect interpretation result ( e.g . severe fibromyalgia , rheumatoid arthritis ) . Conditions make acupuncture difficult ( e.g . paralysis , psychosis ) , Prior acupuncture treatment back pain ; 1 year wait type . The intent undergo surgery time involvement study . History cardiac , respiratory , nervous system disease , Dr. Wasan 's judgment , preclude participation study heighten potential adverse outcome . For example : asthma claustrophobia . Presence contraindication MRI scanning . For example : cardiac pacemaker , metal implant , fear close space , pregnancy . Involvement workman 's compensation disability claim . Radicular pain extend knee . Active substance abuse disorder within last 24 month , base subject selfreport . Use 60 mg morphine equivalent prescription opioids steroid pain .
